document.full_text: blackberry maker research in motion says it has bought ontario-based startup tinyhippos inc, creator of ripple, a cross-platform mobile application development and testing tool.
document.title: rim acquires mobile app tool developer tinyhippos
lines_and_colors: blackberry maker research in motion says it has bought ontario-based startup tinyhippos inc, creator of ripple, a cross-platform mobile application development and testing tool.
